text:
thanks for the reply, i do hope it's added & rather sooner then later, encountered some issues before trying to get the associated HubSpot Object id (not the UUID) and name of the campaign and had to resort to creating custom fields in the HubSpot Deal i could access to basically hold what i should be able to get from  a public campaigns api.

Thanks in advance :smile:

<#C2YHAHB6K|api>
I am integrating the company contact and Deal object in one of my application now the issue is when there is a no domain available or wrong domain available it stopeed me adding the company. so is there a way where i can bypass the domain validation and verification while creating the company
`{`
  `"validationResults": [`
    `{`
      `"isValid": false,`
      `"message": "\" \" is an invalid domain",`
      `"error": "INVALID_DOMAIN",`
      `"name": "domain"`
    `}`
  `]`

This is the issue i am facing

Hey Everyone! Has anyone managed to find a workaround for this:
On our mobile app we are using the tickets api to allow someone to submit a support ticket. This is then creating the ticket in the tickets list but not opening a conversation so we can then email and support the user. How do we do this?

Does anybody know if the HubSpot CMS Enterprise membership feature can use an external login to authorize? Essentially, we want to use the login and password that users already have instead of creating a new one
actually, it looks like SSO is supported
so that seems like it would work...right?
Yea, Saml based SSO is what's supported.
SSO including special integration for Google and Facebook accounts through the social login feature (optional)
